description: This file is an ESLint configuration module specific to a Next.js project using ECMAScript modules. It imports necessary modules, determines directory paths, creates compatibility configurations, and exports an ESLint configuration array tailored for Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript support.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Gets the directory name of a path.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a file path.
